name: promised-db
description: IndexedDB with a better API using contextual interfaces and timeout support.

scripts.build: tslint --project tsconfig.json && tsc && uglifyjs promised-db.js --in-source-map promised-db.js.map --source-map dist/promised-db.js.map --screw-ie8 -mc --output dist/promised-db.min.js

author: Arthur Langereis
